How to Install barrage on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • barrage

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install barrage on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing barrage on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall barrage in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install barrage, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install barrage Using apt

To install barrage in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install barrage using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install barrage

The installation of barrage might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install barrage Using apt-get

To install barrage using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install barrage.

sudo apt-get -y install barrage

Install barrage Using Synaptic

To install barrage using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install barrage on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for barrage. This will display the barrage package in the package window, now to install barrage, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the barrage package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of barrage.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install barrage Using aptitude

To install barrage on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of barrage.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install barrage using the command aptitude install barrage.

sudo aptitude -y install barrage

How to Upgrade barrage on debian

If you want to upgrade the barrage package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade barrage using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade barrage to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade barrage.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade barrage sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade barrage

Upgrade barrage using Aptitude

To upgrade barrage using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade barrage.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade barrage

Upgrade barrage using Synaptic

To upgrade barrage using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for barrage, now right-click barrage, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade barrage just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall barrage on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall barrage from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just barrage, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove barrage

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of barrage

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of barrage you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge barrage

Remove barrage using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall barrage using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for barrage, right-click the barrage package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall barrage click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install barrage on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade barrage using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of barrage then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
